chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Hey baby bro. How have you been? We haven't talked in a while.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Good.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: It sucks that I'm so far away for college because I heard you killed it at your last game a few weeks ago.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Yeah I guess.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Luca? What is it? You okay? You're not still made at me for leaving for school are ya buddy?

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: No. Mom and Dad are fighting again.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Like yelling fighting?

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Yeah. What other kind of fighting?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Nothing. They could be not talking to each other or something.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I heard like a squishy thud sound. A couple of times. Like on TV when people are fighting each other.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: What do you think that was?

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: IDK I went to go peak and Dad saw me and said mom fell down the stairs. It didn't sound like when she did the last few times though.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: I'm sorry buddy. Did you see mom? Was she ok?

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Only a little. Dad was in front of her. He yelled at me for not staying in my room. Mom didn't say anything. She didn't even move.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Okay well do that. Stay in your room and don't do anything but talk to me. Get out a book or something and if Dad comes in just pretend to read.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Why? That would be lying and I could get in trouble more.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: I don't want him to get mad at you anymore. You just need to trust that as your big sister I love you and I won't let anyone hurt you.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Who would want to hurt me Amber?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: No one buddy. And no one will.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I think everything is okay now. Daddy's friends', Will and James are here now.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: What is mom doing? Don't get caught looking and don't leave your room.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: She's taking a nap on the couch.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: She never does that. Where is Dad?

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: He's outside with his friends? What's wrong?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Nothing but I need you to listen to me carefully...quickly and quietly go to mom and hold her wrist and tell me if you feel something.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I know what a pulse is. Moms not dead. You're acting strange.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Do it Luca! Then go back to your room alright.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Amber I'm scared. I didn't feel one.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Check her breathing. See if you feel air coming from her nose.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Nothing! Nothing at all! What do I do? Dad is gonna think I did this. Is she going to be okay Amber?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Just stay calm for me sweetie. Go to your room and turn on the TV alright.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Stay calm. He is going to come in to check on you soon. Just keep watching TV

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: He came in just now. He didn't say anything just looked around.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Good. You're going to need to go to the train station.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Why? I don't know how to ride the train. Dad is going to be mad at me Amber. You're not even here.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Just listen to me Luca. I'm trying to keep you safe.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: From what? Does someone want to kidnap me?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Yes! And you can't tell Dad because they said so. So listening to me is how you don't get kidnapped ok.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I'm going to be brave like a super hero Amber. I promise. I'm going to sneak out through the back. I'll text you when I get there.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Okay. Stay safe. When you get there get on the red line. It will say it is going to Doraville. When you get there come out the front of the train station and take a right to keep going straight. 3 blocks down you will see a red brick building on the left with no signs. It's a home for abuse victims. Call me and I will explain everything to them.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: You think mom was abused?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: We will talk about it later. Just stay alert. I've got your back little man.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I'm on the train now. I don't see anyone weird.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Amber!!! They're here. They're sitting right across from me.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Mom is leaning on one of them. She probably came to look for me.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: My God! He is truly sick. Stay calm. Pretend like you don't see them.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Should I move away? You don't want me to help mom?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: We will just trust me. On the next stop get off at the last minute and catch the next train going in the same direction.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: They know it's me. They're pointing at me. Will just picked up mom's hand and waved it at me. Amber can you just come get me? I can't do this. Can't we call the police?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: We can, but not yet. You have to get to that place. They will help you to get to me. I'm not really away at college I'm only 16 Luca. Dad did the same thing to my real mom. I know how to help you. Just stay brave and trust me.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Alright. I'm on the next train. Why didn't you tell me before? And what did he do?

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: You're my little brother. I have to protect you. But we will talk about it later. Just do as I said. Doraville station. Don't forget.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Luca It's been almost an hour. It doesn't take this long. Let me know you're okay.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Luca. Where are you? Are you in a bad service area or in one of those tunnels? At least type something so I know you're okay.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I'm sorry Amber.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: It's okay. I'm just relieved you're alright. Did you make it to the place I told you about?

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: Yeah. Dad was there.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I'm in the trunk now. He said he knows I had help and if it was you to tell you goodbye from me and he will see you soon.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: Luca. Where are you? Kick out a tail light. Luca! Don't give up.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I feel really light headed. He hit me before he put me in here. I'm bleeding a lot too.

chat.name: Amber
chat.message: You aren't alone. I love you Luca. Just think about that. Don't be afraid.

chat.name: Luca
chat.message: I know I'm not alone. Mom is back here too. She's asleep again though.
